title: Query the Grok AI API — query_grok
text: Sends question Grok AI API xAI returns response.

title: Query the Grok AI API — query_grok
code: query_grok(   question,   api_key,   endpoint = "https://api.x.ai/v1/chat/completions",   model = "grok-2-1212",   debug_flag = FALSE )

title: Query the Grok AI API — query_grok
text: question character string containing question ask Grok. api_key character string xAI API key. endpoint character string specifying API endpoint URL. Defaults "https://api.x.ai/v1/chat/completions". model character string specifying Grok model use. Defaults "grok-2-1212". debug_flag logical value indicating whether print debug information (status code raw response). Defaults FALSE.
